thumb.title: Sharks and Other Sea Creatures (original song, Vocaloid, Akito & Jessica)
thumb.description: The song's about betrayal: about mixing with the wrong crowd, who then drop you from a great height. It's a love song. Tech NotesLots of favourites amongst the twenty-three sound sources: Auron, Trip (Halion), Oxid (fullbucket.de), CS80 (Arturia), PolyMax (UAD) Padshop, Retrologue (Cubase), Thor (Reason) synths, NN-XT (Reason) sampler, vocal synth (Akito & Jessica, Vocaloid). Video CreditsJarod Barton: https://www.pexels.com/video/shark-swimming-in-deep-blue-water-17186320/ Andrej Barg: https://www.pexels.com/video/hai-18492392/ Adrien JACTA: https://www.pexels.com/video/egypt-red-sea-bde-looking-at-a-hammerhead-shark-from-below-27263875/ Sébastien Vincon: https://www.pexels.com/video/swimming-underwater-with-sharks-10341595/
